comment.author: 38144390@N04
comment._content: The midnight sun is not strange to me as i live in Tromsø. But I've truly never seen anything like this called the midnight sun. The explanation can not be long exposure, lenses or any technically factor. The explanation, I belive, is that this is simply a picture of a moonlit evening in the autumn. Lovely, though.

comment._content: This picture is so awesome. There is a hint of a red glow coming off the picture that is so breathtaking and it makes me want to be there right now.
